title: An Interview with Douglas Margetts
creator_credit: Douglas Margetts and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: Douglas Margetts served as part of the Australian 6th Division Signals and served in the Middle East and New Guinea in World War II. He relates his experiences as part of “In our words”, a Digital Storytelling workshop for Victorian war veterans.
description: Douglas Margetts served as part of the Australian 6th Division Signals and served in the Middle East and New Guinea in World War II. He relates his experiences as part of “In our words”, a Digital Storytelling workshop for Victorian war veterans.
